Body:
"""
        Test that the right error is raised when an invalid asymmetric
        decryption algorithm is specified.
        """
engine = crypto.CryptographyEngine()
args = 'invalid', b'', b'', None, None
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.InvalidField,
    "The cryptographic algorithm 'invalid' is not supported for asymmetric decryption."
    , engine._decrypt_asymmetric, *args)
